title: Category page product filtering by route slug

requirements.summary: Filter category product listing to only render products whose product.category matches the current categorySlug route param and show empty-state only when that filtered set is empty.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to a category route (e.g., /products/<categorySlug> or the appâ€™s equivalent) only renders products where product.category equals the selected category slug.
If there are products in other categories, they are not shown on this category page.
The existing empty-state message is shown only when there are no products for the selected category (not merely when other categories have products).
No changes are made to the HomePage product listing behavior (per latest clarification).

file_operations.description: Derive a filteredProducts list by applying a strict equality filter (product.category === categorySlug) to the results of useGetProducts(), and render the grid/empty-state based on filteredProducts (not all products). Keep existing invalid-category handling and ensure the empty-state message only shows when filteredProducts is empty.

Apply the same categorySlug-based filtering (product.category === categorySlug) before rendering products so any template-based category pages also only show products for their category, with the empty-state based on the filtered list.
